caption.p:
CD27 and CD28 expression is reduced on T cells from CMV + young adults.
(A) Representative flow plots showing CD27 and CD28 expression on CD4 + (left) and CD8 + (right) T cells in CMV − (top row) and CMV + (bottom row) individuals. (B) Frequency of CD4 + T cells that are CD27 −CD28 −. (C) Frequency of CD8 + T cells that are CD27 −CD28 −. (D and E) Ratio of CD27 +CD28 + to CD27 −CD28 − within effector memory (EM; CD45RA −CCR7 −) CD4 + (D) and effector memory CD8 + (E) T cells. UK CMV −, n = 8; UK CMV +, n = 8; Senegal, n = 27. Kruskal–Wallis analyses with Dunn’s post-test across all three groups. **, P < 0.01; ***, P < 0.001; ****, P < 0.0001. Medians shown for all column graphs. Error bars indicate IQRs.
